name: Safari Jungle Animal Hunting
description:
You have powerful 4X4 off road hunting jeep for drive and hunt all wild animals at Africa forest. Ride on jeep into the deep and dangerous jangle on off-road sloppy tracks. You have to drive jeep and find the wild animals to hunt them. Be careful some dangerous wild animal’s lion, tiger, crocodile and many others can attack and kill you.

In this Safari Jungle Animal Hunting you have different mission in every next level, kill the safari animals lion, fox, crocodile, elephant, bear and also hunt the fishes which can make counter attack on your 4x4 Jeep when you shoot the first bullet, you are equipped with unique and deadly killing weapons, hunt some deadly animals from helicopter with gunship, AK47, Short Gun, Pistol and Sniper.

You never experience hunt from helicopter, in this Safari Jeep Safari Jungle Animal Hunting game you will get gunship hunting experience. You are required to hit animal on exact target, remember that animals will kill with more bullets if you shoot the on their body, kill them with headshot only one bullet and get some bonus reward. Hold your breath and take sniper gun, zoom the target animal and shoot from distance and kill them all.

Some huge animals bear, hippo, elephant, lion and buffalo will alert on first bullet shoot and then you have to unstoppable strike on these wild animals. As an adventure jungle animal sniper hunter you are responsible to save the jungle greenery, beautiful birds life and don't start war with forest animals. Shoot deer, hippo, attacking lion, water animal’s fishes, and crocodile quietly with your sharp sniper shooting skills. Very smooth and addictive game play, HD graphics, animals run, kill, attacking and walking animation.

Safari Jungle Animal Hunting Features:

Big hunting game, not only on foot but also moving vehicles
Different deadly weapons for hunt on jeep and helicopter
Great helicopter animal hunting experience
No connection required, play without internet and sign up account
Free open world environment with HD graphics
3D animated deep, green and dark forest for hunting
Realistic animal sound and entertaining game music
Realistic safari jeep hunting experience
